mapper.select:
select aa.* from( SELECT d.roomSeq, d.roomType, d.price, d.status, d.roomDesc, d.rooms_delNy, d.roomRgDate, d.roomEditDate, d.Hotel_seq, c.hotelName
ORDER BY d.roomSeq DESC )aa limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}

SELECT d.roomSeq, d.roomType, d.price, d.status, d.roomDesc, d.rooms_delNy, d.roomRgDate, d.roomEditDate, d.Hotel_seq, c.hotelName FROM rooms d LEFT JOIN hotel c ON d.Hotel_seq = c.hotelSeq WHERE 1=1 AND d.roomSeq = #{roomSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rooms ( roomType, price, status, roomDesc, rooms_delNy, roomRgDate, roomEditDate, Hotel_seq ) VALUES ( #{roomType}, #{price}, #{status}, #{roomDesc}, #{rooms_delNy}, now(), now(), #{Hotel_seq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE rooms SET roomType = #{roomType}, price = #{price}, status = #{status}, roomDesc = #{status}, rooms_delNy = 0, roomEditDate = now(), Hotel_seq = #{Hotel_seq} WHERE 1=1 AND roomSeq = #{roomSeq}
